1561950.name: Myha - Bonus Content Pack
1561950.description:
Note: this Bonus Content pack is a Zip archive. You will have to open it from your local Steam folder.

This free DLC includes :

- The artbook of Myha (Kickstarter reward) + Myha Original Artbook: Making A Game On My Own, both in PDF format. They look back at the creation of the games, the Original in 2016 and the Remake in 2018-2019.

- The original soundtrack of Myha composed by Olivier Maurey (mp3).

- The Original version in 2d of Myha, created in 2 weeks during the Myst Game Jam of 2016, developed with Adventure Maker. It's the game that gave birth to Myha: Return to the Lost Island! Compare the two versions for the fun!

- A Making Of video, originally sent to the KS backers, now available for everyone two years later.

- The opening short film, the game cover, wallpapers.

Myha is a 3d adventure game in Unreal Engine (of the type Puzzle, Narrative Driven game) that is played in first person view (Myst-like), developed in 2018 and 2019 by Denis Martin under the supervision of Simon Mesnard, with the help of a Kickstater.
1561950.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
